title: A easy way to fix Rylais
body: Make it that it can't be re-apply on a previously slowed target for x seconds, similar to udyr e and yasuo e.

replies.body: Rylai's would be completely worthless then.
Why does rylais need a fix exactly....?

Champions with super low cd ability/dmg mechanics are abusing rylais to the point where they are gaining perma slows on their abilities, which isn't healthy on a balance perspective. For exmple Azir, Cass, and Viktor.

Azir just needs his soldiers to be considered pet attacks (rylai's would then slow for 20% rather than 40%).

Cass and Viktor are fine in terms of Rylai's synergy imo.  Cass kinda needs it.
it needs no fix. its fine as it is. stop asking.
Um, isn't this basically the same thing I posted a day or 2 ago?

then the slow would need to be a hell of a lot stronger and/or last for quite a bit longer which would be even more frustrating at some points. If you just make it that you can't slow someone repeatedly then you are essentially killing the entire point of the item and making it to be nothing more than a stat stick with a slow that isn't going to be of much use if any

an easy way to make it useless
you may as well just remove it from the game
Leave the passive as is, just make it 40-50 AP.

40-50 AP isn't enough to buy it on a mage anymore.  It would become an item for supports, but supports don't get enough gold to reliably put Rylai's in their build.  I'd much rather have the HP on it nerfed than the AP.

Really though, 40-50 AP is absolute garbage for a mage item.  Even Zhonya's (which I don't usually buy anymore from it's massive loss in AP) has 60 AP on it.  I could see Rylai's being nerfed to 80 AP, but beyond that would seem a bit excessive.
